attributes.action: Reverse the planned privatisation of Radio 4
attributes.background: The IEA, a think tank which is strongly associated with the Tory party, has begun the process of privatising 60% of the Radio 4. This is truly shocking news; the BBC should remain a public asset. Putting profit ahead of being an unbiased service puts power into the hands of the super rich.

rejection.details: This is a proposal made by an independent thinktank. The Government has not announced any plans to privatise Radio 4.
